metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]

properties.description: GoogleSCC data connector with template version 1.0.0

connectorUiConfig.title: Google SCC
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Security Command Center is a comprehensive security and risk management platform for Google Cloud, ingested from Sentinel's connector. It offers features such as asset inventory and discovery, vulnerability and threat detection, and risk mitigation and remediation to help you gain insight into your organization's security and data attack surface. This integration enables you to perform tasks related to findings and assets more effectively.

dataTypes.name: {{graphQueriesTableName}}

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Read and Write permissions are required.

Read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key)

instructionSteps.title: Connect Google to Microsoft Sentinel
instructionSteps.description: To enable Google SCC for Microsoft Sentinel, provide the required information below and click on Connect.

dataFlows.transformKql:
source
| extend TimeGenerated =  todatetime(finding.eventTime), findings = parse_json(finding), resource = parse_json(resource), sourceProperties = parse_json(sourceProperties)
 | extend canonicalName = tostring(findings.canonicalName)
 | extend category = tostring(findings.category)
 | extend finding_access = findings.access
 | extend assetDisplayName = tostring(findings.assetDisplayName)
 | extend assetId = tostring(findings.assetId)
 | extend cloudDlpDataProfile = todynamic(findings.cloudDlpDataProfile)
 | extend cloudDlpInspection = todynamic(findings.cloudDlpInspection)
 | extend createTime = todatetime(findings.createTime)
 | extend finding_database = todynamic(findings.database)
 | extend compliances = todynamic(findings.compliance)
| extend description = tostring(findings.description)
 | extend eventTime = todatetime(findings.eventTime)
  | extend exfiltration = todynamic(findings.exfiltration)
  | extend externalUri = tostring(findings.externalUri)
 | extend findingClass = tostring(findings.findingClass)
 | extend findingProviderId = tostring(findings.findingProviderId)
 | extend indicator = todynamic(findings.indicator)
 | extend kernelRootkit = todynamic(findings.kernelRootkit)
 | extend kubernetes = todynamic(findings.kubernetes)
| extend mitreAttack = todynamic(findings.mitreAttack)
 | extend mute = tostring(findings.mute)
 | extend name = tostring(findings.name)
  |  extend parent = tostring(findings.parent)
 | extend parentDisplayName = tostring(findings.parentDisplayName) 
 | extend resourceName = tostring(findings.resourceName)
 | extend severity = tostring(findings.severity)
 | extend state = tostring(findings.state)
 | extend vulnerability = todynamic(findings.vulnerability)
 | extend workflowState = tostring(findings.workflowState)
 | extend resource_name = tostring(resource.name)
 | extend resource_DisplayName = tostring(resource.DisplayName)
 | extend resource_project = tostring(resource.['project'])
 | extend projectDisplayName = tostring(resource.projectDisplayName)
 | extend resource_parent = tostring(resource.parent)
 | extend resource_parentDisplayName = tostring(resource.parentDisplayName) 
| extend resource_type = tostring(resource.type)
 | extend folders = tostring(resource.folders)

source.name: Google Cloud Platform Security Command Center
Google Cloud Platform Security Command Center

connectorUiConfig.title: Google Security Command Center
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Security Command Center is a comprehensive security and risk management platform for Google Cloud, ingested from Sentinel's connector. It offers features such as asset inventory and discovery, vulnerability and threat detection, and risk mitigation and remediation to help you gain insight into your organization's security and data attack surface. This integration enables you to perform tasks related to findings and assets more effectively.

dataTypes.name: {{graphQueriesTableName}}

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Read and Write permissions are required.

Read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key)

parameters.content:
#### 1. Set up your GCP environment 
 You must have the following GCP resources defined and configured: topic, subscription for the topic, workload identity pool, workload identity provider and service account with permissions to get and consume from subscription. 
 Terraform provides API for the IAM that creates the resources. [Link to Terraform scripts](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/tree/master/DataConnectors/GCP/Terraform/sentinel_resources_creation).

parameters.label: Tenant ID: A unique identifier that is used as an input in the Terraform configuration within a GCP environment.
parameters.name: PoolId

parameters.content:
#### 2. Connect new collectors 
 To enable GCP Audit Logs for Microsoft Sentinel, click the Add new collector button, fill the required information in the context pane and click on Connect.

properties.description: GoogleSCC data connector with template version 2.0.0
